subject: Preakness Stakes
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Icabad Crane, who finished third in the 2008 Preakness Stakes, rallied to beat Manteca by a half-length in the Alex M. Robb Stakes for New York-breds at Aqueduct.
snippet: Icabad Crane, who finished third in the 2008 Preakness Stakes, rallied to beat Manteca by a half-length in the Alex M. Robb Stakes for New York-breds at Aqueduct.
